page.title: 05SCHOOLYARD GAMES IN WINLATON
page.content:
We chant a dip rhyme at the start of a game to find a person to be leader. We always say the person is 'ON'. Here are some of the dip rhymes used at WEST LANE PRIMARY SCHOOL. "Dip do Magazoo It is not you"
"Train train number nine Going down the cargo line, If the train comes off the track, Do you want your money back? Yes or No, Yes, Yes spells Yes and you are not on, By one two three, A B C."
"I bble abble black bobble I bble abble out, If you see a black bobble Please step out."
